name: Froge (CodeWordZ)
description:
Decided to do a game jam over the weekend where the theme was "Frogs" and  it had to incorporate "Time Limit" into the gameplay. So obviously I threw a frog hat on my dog and made a game!

You play as Amira jumping from lily pad to lily pad collecting treats! Chomp on as many as you can! See if you can beat my score of 232 :D

Credits:

Developed by yours truly

Sound design: Amira (Yes all of the sound effects are made by my dog)

Music: penguinmusic from Pixabay

Shout out to my spouse for the inspiration 💛
